ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ سَمِعْنَا فَتًى يَذْكُرُهُمْ يُقَالُ لَهُۥٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'We heard a young man mentioning them. They call him Ibrahim.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They said: "We heard a youth talk about them. He is called Abraham."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Some of them said: "We heard a youth called Abraham speak (ill) of them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Some of them said, "We heard a youth called Abraham speaking against the idols".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Some among them said, “We heard a youth speak ill of them – the one called Ibrahim.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "We heard a young man talking against them, who is called Ibrahim."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: We heard a youth called Ibrahim speak of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'We heard a young man making mention of them, and he was called Abraham.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: We heard a youth make mention of them, who is called Abraham.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Some said, "We heard a young man, called Abraham, talking about them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: We heard a youth speak of them, who is called Ibrahim.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘We heard a young man mentioning them. He is called ‘‘Abraham.’’ ’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said, "We heard a youth talk of them: He is called Abraham."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "We heard a young man talking (against) them who is called Ibrahim (Abraham)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We have heard a young man called Abraham mention them' they replied.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “We heard a youth mentioning them. He is called Abraham.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "We heard a young man mention them who is called Abraham."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:60] They said, one to the other: ‘We heard a young man making [ill] mention of them, deriding them — he is called Abraham’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said) a man among them said: (We heard a youth make mention of them) speaking ill of them and mentioning that he will break them, (who is called Abraham).
